data.title: Niko McCarty on LinkedIn: The first Asimov Press books are finally here! An initial 500 copies were…
data.meta_description: The first Asimov Press books are finally here! An initial 500 copies were delivered to our hotel in San Jose. It feels surreal to see all of this hard work in… | 13 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
Do you see all these packages of frankincense? Well guess what? you get all of them in my frankincense book course. Read the book, answer 80 question exam, and use all these resins to follow along in the recorded workshop You will receive by mail 1/2 ounce of Frankincense Resin: plus a few more resins Boswellia carteri, Boswellia Brown sacra, Boswellia papyrifera, Boswellia neglecta, 3rd grade Boswelia frereana, Boswellia serrata, Myrrh, Opoponox, Dammar copal, Acacia Gum resin, 1 Palo Santo Stick, (plus a few pieces extras of other resins so you can touch and taste), shipping is included. No one gives you so much in a course . You can purchase the book or if you have the book already. There is an option to take the course also. You will learn all about these resins and how to use them medicinally. All the information is here With or without the book, but you must have the book to take this course . You will also receive if needed seven CEU credits . If you live outside the United States, you can still take the course, but I cannot send you the resin and I gave you a different price. https://lnkd.in/e6MQdtf

The Beckmann rearrangement allows the conversion of aldoximes and ketoximes to the corresponding amides in acidic medium. The stereochemical outcome of this rearrangement is predictable: the R group anti to the leaving group on the nitrogen will migrate. . The Chemists' Cookbook. Sign up for the waitlist to receive a discount at launch: https://lnkd.in/dZn48VP3 . If you enjoy this type of content, don't miss out! Subscribe to my free newsletter and join 750+ subscribers who already receive it straight to their inbox: https://nrochemistry.com/ . . #organicchemistry #namereactions #experimentalprocedures #NROChemistry
